This movie is about a young man named Tom Hulce who has a superpower that allows him to travel through time.
Tom's power gives him advantages over his enemies in both past and present times. However, as Tom grows older and becomes more powerful, he also begins to suffer from the consequences of his actions in the past and present times.
As Tom struggles with these consequences, he also begins to question whether it is truly possible for a single individual to have such immense power and influence over both past and present times.
As Tom continues to struggle with these consequences, he also begins to develop feelings of attachment towards some of the individuals that Tom has encountered throughout his various adventures in both past and present times.

Pan has been trained since childhood to identify and avoid the soldiers who have been ordered to capture her.
However, Pan is not alone in this war between two civilizations. The other side of this war are the soldiers who have been ordered to capture Pan.
The soldiers who have been ordered to capture Pan have a secret weapon that they have been using for years. This secret weapon has been used by the soldiers who have been ordered to capture Pan to defeat and capture the other soldiers who have been ordered to capture Pan.
